channel.title: Benoit Gaüzère website
channel.description: Recent content on Benoit Gaüzère website

item.description: Research Activities My current research lies at the interface of graph based representation of data and the definition of machine learning methods operating on graphs. In my recent works, I focused on : learning edit costs for graph edit distanceI’m currently working at improve pooling layer for GNN : poolinga define methods to alleviate the problem of preimage of graphs apply graph based machine learning methods to chemoinformatics An up to date list of publications can be found at Google Scholar.
